data.text: @MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley Kenny's vindictive and totalitarian tendencies. He and operatives are out there using Alberta's institution of government against those who criticize him.

@TDenommee @MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley Yikes that is some solid garbage. One issue though is The Provinces set rules for municipalities / cities. I'm a life long Montrealer. We're still facing consequences of Merger/demerger of early 2000's. I live in a demerged borough within. It's complicated and messy.😢
@MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley He can’t run his own house, never mind the cities ……………. #budgetwhiskeypimp
@MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley So... conservatives think the Fed Gov't are dictators, yet this clown is all about freedom? Wtf

@doubleyoujay7 @MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley @jkenney Let alone a Liberal POC. 

The sheer idea of it makes his blood boil.
@doubleyoujay7 @MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley @jkenney He has lost any sense of “authority.” He is delusional.
@MerlinofCanada @RachelNotley Alberta municipalities should invite him to go F🍁CK himself.
